quotes.quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
When you have confidence, you can have a lot of fun. And when you have fun, you can do amazing things.
With confidence, you have won before you have started.
If you have no confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life.
You just have to be yourself and go full with confidence and be courageous.
Confidence... thrives on honesty, on honor, on the sacredness of obligations, on faithful protection and on unselfish performance. Without them it cannot live.
The way to develop self-confidence is to do the thing you fear and get a record of successful experiences behind you.
Always be yourself and have faith in yourself. Do not go out and look for a successful personality and try to duplicate it.
You wouldn't worry so much about what others think of you if you realized how seldom they do.
Low self-confidence isn't a life sentence. Self-confidence can be learned, practiced, and mastered--just like any other skill. Once you master it, everything in your life will change for the better.
Once we believe in ourselves, we can risk curiosity, wonder, spontaneous delight, or any experience that reveals the human spirit.
Trust yourself. Create the kind of self that you will be happy to live with all your life. Make the most of yourself by fanning the tiny, inner sparks of possibility into flames of achievement.
It is confidence in our bodies, minds, and spirits that allows us to keep looking for new adventures.
To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
Confidence comes not from always being right but from not fearing to be wrong.
Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do.
Confidence is a habit that can be developed by acting as if you already had the confidence you desire to have.
Always remember you are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
If you're presenting yourself with confidence, you can pull off pretty much anything.
As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.
Confidence is the sexiest attribute a woman can have. If you feel good, you'll look good.
If you love yourself, it will all work out.
You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.
I have an everyday religion that works for me. Love yourself first, and everything else falls into line.
A flower does not think of competing with the flower next to it. It just blooms.
If you believe in yourself enough and know what you want, you're gonna make it happen.
Confidence is silent. Insecurities are loud.
Just believe in yourself. Even if you don't, pretend that you do and, at some point, you will.
Self confidence is the best outfit. Rock it and own it.
It's not who you are that holds you back, it's who you think you're not.
Make the most of yourself, for that is all there is of you.
It is not the mountain we conquer but ourselves.
Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
Confidence is preparation. Everything else is beyond your control.
Think like a queen. A queen is not afraid to fail. Failure is another stepping stone to greatness.
Why should I care what other people think of me? I am who I am. And who I wanna be.
Sooner or later, those who win are those who think they can.
I am, indeed, a king, because I know how to rule myself.
Confidence, like art, never comes from having all the answers; it comes from being open to all the questions.
You have to have confidence in your ability, and then be tough enough to follow through.
With confidence, you can reach truly amazing heights; without confidence, even the simplest accomplishments are beyond your grasp.
There is nothing more attractive than confidence, once you see your own beauty, so will everyone else.
Confidence is not achieved overnight. It can be achieved by learning from mistakes, it can be achieved by learning from experience.
A ship is safe in harbor, but that's not what ships are for.
They can do all because they think they can.
What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
Confidence is something you acquire in yourself by believing in self ability with courage and conviction.
Confidence is going after Moby Dick in a rowboat and taking the tartar sauce with you.
